Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Order response identifier
Element.Description: A transaction instance must have an identifier. The identifier enables referencing the transaction for various purposes such as from other transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Sales order reference
Element.Description: An identifier of a referenced sales order, issued by the Seller.

Element.Name: Order response issue date
Element.Description: The date on which the transaction instance was issued.

Element.Name: Order response issue time
Element.Description: The time on which the transaction instance was issued

Element.Name: Response code
Element.Description: A code that indicates whether the referenced order has been received and not yet processed, or is Accepted or Rejected as whole, alternatively, Accepted with change or already delivered.If response code is Accept or Reject there may not be any response lines.

Element.Name: Response clarification
Element.Description: Clarification of the suppliers decision.

Element.Name: Document currency
Element.Description: The default currency for the offer.

Element.Name: Buyer reference identifier
Element.Description: An identifier assigned by the Buyer used for internal routing purposes.The identifier is defined by the buyer (contact ID, department, office id, project code), but provided by the seller in the order response.

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: Used to reference the order that is being responded to.

Element.Name: Seller party electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the seller party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Seller party identification
Element.Description: Identifies a party.

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: The name of the party.

Element.Name: Buyer party electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the buyer party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Buyer party identification
Element.Description: An identification for the buyer party.

Element.Name: Buyer party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who ordered the items and receives the response.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Document line identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the response line. Each order response line MUST be unique within the order response.

Element.Name: Response clarification
Element.Description: Clarifacation of the suppliers decision for the line.
Element.Value: Please note our offices are closed in July, all orders received will be processed in August

Element.Name: Response code
Element.Description: A code that indicates whether the referenced order line as whole is Accepted or Rejected or, alternatively, Accepted with change.

Element.Name: Quantity
Element.Description: The quantity of items that will be delivered.

Attribute.Name: Ordered quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the ordered quantity.

Element.Name: Maximum backorder quantity
Element.Description: The quantity of items that will be delivered at a later time. A unit for the backordered quantity is the same as for the Quantity. If none of the remaining quantity for the response line is to be delivered, use 0 "zero".

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Item price
Element.Description: The net price of an item including discounts or surcharges that apply to the price.Although price is an optional element in an offer it recommended as best practice to either state the price or provide reference to an appropriate source from which the price can be identified such as a contract, catalogue or a quote.. The price amount. The net price of the item including all allowances, charges and taxes but exluding TAX.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, must have the same value as element "Document currency".

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: The actual quantity to which the price applies.

Attribute.Name: Base quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the base quantity.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A short name given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description. A short name for the item.

Element.Name: Buyers item identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the buyer, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the buyer's system.

Element.Name: The Sellers item identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: An item identifier based on a registered scheme. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Name: Substituted line item by the seller
Substituted Line Item Identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of the substituted line item

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A short name optionally given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description. A short name for the item.

Element.Name: Sellers item identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: An item identifier based on a registered scheme. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Name: Item classification code
Element.Description: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature. Classification codes are used to allow grouping of similar items for a various purposes e.g. public procurement (CPV), e-Commerce (UNSPSC) etc.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier version identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme version identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Clear text name equivalent of classification code
Attribute.Description: The textual equivalent of the code value

Element.Name: Item TAX category code
Element.Description: The TAX category code for the item.

Element.Name: Line TAX rate
Element.Description: The TAX percentage rate that applies to the line amount.
Tax scheme. E.g. “VAT” or “GST”

Element.Name: Additional item property information
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about properties of the goods and services invoiced.

Element.Name: Item property name
Element.Description: The name of the property.The name must be sufficiently descriptive to define the value. The definition may be supplemented with the property unit of measure when relevant.

Element.Name: Item property code
Element.Description: Code for the item property according to a property code system.

Attribute.Name: Name code list id.
Attribute.Description: An identifier for the code list used for the Name code, this is bilaterally agreed

Element.Name: Item property value
Element.Description: The value of the item property.

Element.Name: Item property unit of measure
Element.Description: The unit of measure in which the property value is stated, if relevant. May not be relevant when properties are descriptive.

Attribute.Name: Value quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the value quantity.

Element.Name: Property classification
Element.Description: Standardized and predefined classification of items properties.

Element.Name: Order line reference
Element.Description: Used to reference the initial order line that correspondes to the response.All order lines should be stated when an order is changed.
